reviewText: SIX SHOOTER WESTERNS is a budget-priced VHS tape crammed full with a half-dozen vintage cowboy "programmers." Transfer quality of these unrestored 60 to 70 year-old films is adequate. Of greater concern to the potential buyer should be the tape's SLP speed-- it may not track well in some VCRs. (This product is not available on DVD.) SYNOPSES-- FORBIDDEN TRAILS-- An exciting entry in the "Rough Riders" series. Highlight is the rescue from a blazing cabin of Buck Jones by his horse Silver. GUNS OF FURY-- Cisco Kid and Pancho go up against a town's leading citizens in order to clear the name of a man wrongly convicted of murder. HELL TOWN-- Second screen adaptation of Zane Grey tale stars John Wayne as a drifter who romances a Wyoming rancher's girlfriend. To be rid of his rival, the rancher hires him for a hazardous job. Olympic gold medalist Jim Thorpe has a cameo. MY PAL TRIGGER-- This highly successful film was also Roy Rogers' favorite. The birth of Trigger helps clear Roy in the shooting death of the colt's sire, Golden Sovereign. OH, SUSANNAH!-- Gene Autry is tossed off a train. His assailant assumes Gene's identity, robs and kills our hero's friend and Autry is jailed for the crime. Two allies aid Gene's escape and they all set out to clear his name. RIDERS OF THE ROCKIES-- Tex Ritter and the Texas Rangers battle border rustlers. When his friends are wrongly jailed for steer thieving, Tex joins the gang that's responsible in order to bring them to justice. Watch for early Cisco Kid sidekick Martin Garralaga as Capt. Mendoza. Fans of old-time westerns are sure to enjoy MILL CREEK's COWBOY LEGENDS 50 MOVIE PACK, which includes all the 1930's and '40s favorites, plus Lou Gehrig, Rita Hayworth, Marlon Brando, and more! (DVD only) Parenthetical numbers preceding titles are 1 to 10 viewer poll ratings found at a film resource website. (7.1) Forbidden Trails (1941) - Buck Jones/Tim McCoy/Raymond Hatton/Christine McIntyre/Dave O'Brien/Tristram Coffin (6.7) Guns of Fury ("The Daring Caballero") (1949) - Duncan Renaldo/Leo Carillo/Kippee Valez/Charles Halton/Pedro de Cordoba (6.0) Hell Town ("Born to the West") (1937) - John Wayne/Marsha Hunt/Johnny Mack Brown/Monte Blue/Lucien Littlefield (uncredited: Jim Thorpe) (6.4) My Pal Trigger (1946) - Roy Rogers/George 'Gabby' Hayes/Dale Evans/Jack Holt/LeRoy Mason/Roy Barcroft/Sam Flint (5.8) Oh, Susannah! (1936) - Gene Autry/Smiley Burnette/Frances Grant/Earle Hodgins/Donald Kirke/Boothe Howard (4.5) Riders of the Rockies (1937) - Tex Ritter/Louise Stanley/Horace Murphy/'Snub' Pollard/Earl Dwire/Yakima Canutt/Martin Garralaga
